attributes.value: Inspired by our original tennis shoe, the Killshot 2 gets refreshed with seasonal colours that are easy to style. Its low-profile design and smooth leather create a retro feel.

Upper material: Leather
Outsole material: PU
Wipe with clean dry cloth
